General.Name: Hunan Huasheng Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd engages in the production, sales and foreign trade of ramie spinning, weaving, printing and dyeing, clothing and apparel, and pharmaceutical machinery products in China. It provides ramie, flax, hemp yarn, fabrics and clothing, professional clothing containing hemp, home textiles, industrial textiles, and medical machinery products. The company sells its products under the Cedar, Dongting, Jin Shuang, and Huasheng Natural Family brand names. It also exports its products to the European Union, the United States, Japan, South Korea, South America, and other countries and regions. Hunan Huasheng Co.,Ltd was founded in 1988 and is based in Changsha, China.
